title: S3 Ep2: Regenerating the cities that were left behind
itunes:title: Regenerating the cities that were left behind
description: When the industries that have sustained our cities decline, how can we regenerate urban areas? At the SUERF conference in Amsterdam, Tony Venables and Charles Goodhart tell Tim Phillips that redevelopment policies may have made regional inequality and social conflict worse.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
